name: SFV OG Kush
description: SFV OG Kush, not to be confused with its precursor SFV OG, is an indica-dominant strain bred from OG Kush genetics by The Cali Connection. By crossing an SFV OG clone with an Afghani father and selecting for favorable traits over several generations, the indica-heavy SFV OG Kush was born. You can smell the OG genes in this one, as its odor is commonly described as a strong lemon cleaner smell intermixed with pine.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Hungry, Sleepy, Uplifted, Pain, Muscle Spasms, Inflammation, Insomnia, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
